attributes.action: One day three votes: European and General elections plus a referendum.
attributes.background: If we have to take part in European elections why not have a general election and a referendum on the same day? Then the new MPs can enact the new mandate of the newly informed country.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because we aren't sure what referendum you would like held. 

If you would like a new referendum on EU membership held at the same time as the next general election you could sign this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/239032

If you would like another general election you could sign this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/235480
